name: Illusory Leafcoil
description: A core formed from tightly coiled leaves, the remnant of the monster known asthe Tenebrous Mimiflora after being vanquished.  It may appear lifeless and dull on the surface, yet a faint, ominous power canstill be sensed pulsing within.  People often wonder where the memories that such creatures drew from the earthgo when they are slain. Perhaps the answer lies within this core...
